commit message: Issue #8: don't load the entire workbook into memory
Show a progress dialog when exporting
Set the progress dialog to not cancelable
Show a determinate progress dialog when exporting
try/catch Throwable around the file export, in case we get OOM errors due to large data sets.  Show a toast instead of force close, in this case.
Created new class TableFileExport, between FileExport and *Export.  Now DBExport extends FileExport without methods related to exporting as a table (writeHeader, writeRow, writeFooter)
Added three different strings for the progress dialog, depending on the step in the export
Don't show the loading progress spinner at the beginning of the export.
Dismiss dialog fragments with dismissAllowingStateLoss instead of dismiss
